snippet: The team could still try to bring back the cornerback, a three-time Pro Bowl selection, at a lesser salary.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets release their top cornerback Antonio Cromartie in a move designed to save millions under the salary cap; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The team could still try to bring back the cornerback, a three-time Pro Bowl selection, at a lesser salary.

headline.main: With an Eye on the Salary Cap, the Jets Release Cromartie
headline.print_headline: With an Eye on the Salary Cap, the Jets Release Cromartie
